SELECT emp_name AS empName,emp_id AS empId,org_id AS orgId,cno, SUM(callInCount) AS callInCount,#致电次数 SUM(callInConnectCount) AS callInConnectCount,#致电接通次数 CONVERT(SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(callInConnectDuration))),CHAR) AS callInConnectDuration,#致电接通时长 #致电通话时长/致电接通次数 平均致电通话时长（时:分:秒） IFNULL(SEC_TO_TIME(FLOOR(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(callInConnectDuration))/SUM(callInConnectCount))),'00:00:00') AS callInConnectDurationAvg, #致电接通率 致电次数*100/致电接通次数 CONVERT(SUM(callInConnectCount) *100/SUM(callInCount) ,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS callInConnectRate, #平均每日通话时长（时:分:秒) 致电通话时长/天数 CONVERT(SEC_TO_TIME(CONVERT(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(callInConnectDuration)) / (TO_DAYS(#{params.normalDate1}) - TO_DAYS(#{params.normalDate})+1),DECIMAL(18,0))),CHAR) AS bridgeDurationDayAvg, createTime FROM cno_in_statistics WHERE 1=1
and (DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
and org_id IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_organization WHERE path LIKE CONCAT(( SELECT path FROM sys_organization WHERE id = #{params.orgId} ), '%') )
GROUP BY cno
order by ${sort} ${order}
ORDER BY CONVERT(empName USING gbk) DESC
